name: raz_rival_01
text: Storm Spirit, my oldest enemy. And I do mean old.
text_simple: storm spirit my oldest enemy and i do mean old

name: raz_rival_02
text: You should drop the thunder and work on your lightning.
text_simple: you should drop the thunder and work on your lightning

name: raz_rival_03
text: Zeus, you handle lightning like a rank amateur.
text_simple: zeus you handle lightning like a rank amateur

name: raz_rival_04
text: Cheap lightning. He buys it by the bolt!
text_simple: cheap lightning he buys it by the bolt

name: raz_rival_05
text: Hm hm hm! Blew your fuses, didn't I?
text_simple: hm hm hm blew your fuses didnt i

name: raz_rival_06
text: Where Sandking fell you'll find a fulgurite.
text_simple: where sandking fell youll find a fulgurite

name: raz_rival_07
text: What's wrong, Tinker? Couldn't handle the load?
text_simple: whats wrong tinker couldnt handle the load

name: raz_rival_09
text: Ha ha ha. I see you weren't properly grounded.
text_simple: ha ha ha i see you werent properly grounded

name: raz_rival_10
text: I'll always be your personal bug zapper.
text_simple: ill always be your personal bug zapper

name: raz_rival_12
text: I expected better from such a good conductor.
text_simple: i expected better from such a good conductor

name: raz_rival_13
text: My lightning shattered that old stump.
text_simple: my lightning shattered that old stump

name: raz_rival_14
text: Should have flown to your nest when you saw me coming, Jakiro.
text_simple: should have flown to your nest when you saw me coming jakiro

name: raz_rival_15
text: When the sky is full of lightning, you shouldn't be flying.
text_simple: when the sky is full of lightning you shouldnt be flying

name: raz_rival_16
text: It was a pleasure to turn your souls against you.
text_simple: it was a pleasure to turn your souls against you

name: raz_rival_19
text: That one couldn't tell AC from DC.
text_simple: that one couldnt tell ac from dc
